mapper.select: SELECT s.sign_no, t.task_no, s.member_no, s.sign_step, s.sign_approver, s.sign_status, s.sign_date, t.project_no, t.member_no, t.task_title, t.task_register_date, t.task_content, t.task_status, t.task_start_date, t.task_end_date, f.file_no, f.file_type, f.file_name, f.file_path, f.file_register_date FROM task t JOIN attached_file f ON t.task_no = f.task_no JOIN sign s ON t.task_no = s.task_no ORDER BY t.task_no ASC

SELECT s.sign_no, t.task_no, s.member_no, s.sign_step, s.sign_approver, s.sign_status, s.sign_date, t.project_no, t.member_no, t.task_title, t.task_register_date, t.task_content, t.task_status, t.task_start_date, t.task_end_date, f.file_no, f.file_type, f.file_name, f.file_path, f.file_register_date FROM task t JOIN attached_file f ON t.task_no = f.task_no JOIN sign s ON t.task_no = s.task_no WHERE t.task_no = #{task_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task(project_no, member_no, task_title, task_register_date, task_content, task_status, task_start_date, task_end_date) VALUES (#{project_no}, #{member_no}, #{task_title}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR), #{task_content}, #{task_status}, #{task_start_date}, #{task_end_date})

INSERT INTO sign(task_no, member_no, sign_step, sign_approver, sign_status, sign_date) VALUES (#{task_no}, #{sign_member_no}, #{sign_step}, #{sign_approver}, #{sign_status}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR))
INSERT INTO attached_file(file_no, task_no, file_type, file_name, file_path, file_register_date) VALUES (#{file_no}, #{task_no}, #{file_type}, #{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{file_register_date})
